original_title: Sri Lanka’s People’s Bank says no loans have been written off as claimed in social media
original_body_lines: ECONOMYNEXT – Sri Lanka’s state-run People’s Bank says no loans have been written off as claimed in social media groups.

Relating to recent views expressed on Peoples Bank’s non-performing loan write-offs, as shared in certain social media groups, the Bank’s Management hereby wishes to categorically deny such statements as being true. To save any future doubt, none of the loans so discussed in the said forums have been written off.
